## AlexaPlatformData interface

Alexa specific data required for publication

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface AlexaPlatformData extends BaseData 
```
<b>Extends:</b> [BaseData](./stentor-models.basedata.md)

|  [distributionCountries](./stentor-models.alexaplatformdata.distributioncountries.md) | string\[\] | Part of the Alexa Skill Manifest publishing information, when isAvailableWorldwide is false this must be specified. |  [distributionMode](./stentor-models.alexaplatformdata.distributionmode.md) | "PUBLIC" \| "PRIVATE" | Part of the Alexa Skill Manifest publishing information, either "PUBLIC" or "PRIVATE".<!-- -->See [https://developer.amazon.com/docs/smapi/skill-manifest.html](https://developer.amazon.com/docs/smapi/skill-manifest.html) |
|  [isAvailableWorldwide](./stentor-models.alexaplatformdata.isavailableworldwide.md) | boolean | Part of the Alexa Skill Manifest publishing information, if true the skill will be distributed in all countries covered by the specified locales.<!-- -->See [https://developer.amazon.com/docs/smapi/skill-manifest.html\#publishinginformation](https://developer.amazon.com/docs/smapi/skill-manifest.html#publishinginformation) |
